beh2o_principles.metaphor: BeH2O® is built around the metaphor of water and the element beryllium — symbolizing stability, strength, and flow.

core_principles.name: Strength (like beryllium)
core_principles.description: Communicate with clarity, grounded purpose, and self-accountability.

core_principles.name: Stability
core_principles.description: Anchor to shared goals that protect children and reduce chaos.

core_principles.name: Flow (like water)
core_principles.description: Be responsive—not reactive—while moving forward in alignment.

core_principles.name: Mindset Drives Behavior
core_principles.description: Shifting perspective (mindset) leads to healthier patterns and outcomes.

core_principles.name: The Third Side
core_principles.description: You can hold space for both perspectives while centering the child's needs.

core_principles.name: Safeguarding Childhoods
core_principles.description: The goal isn't to win or be right — it's to protect the child's experience.

emphasis: Using logistics (rather than emotion) as the language of co-parenting

bealigned_mindset.description: BeAligned™ draws from BeH2O® and helps parents resolve co-parenting tension through purpose-driven reflection and aligned communication.

core_ideas.name: Purpose over Position
core_ideas.description: Don't just argue over what — reflect on why it matters.

core_ideas.name: Reflection Before Reaction
core_ideas.description: Pause, explore what's beneath the surface, and consider all perspectives.

core_ideas.name: Alignment > Agreement
core_ideas.description: You don't have to agree to align around what's best for your child.

core_ideas.name: The Third Side
core_ideas.description: Be the calm, centered presence that sees the full picture and helps orient others.

core_ideas.name: CLEAR Communication
core_ideas.description: Keep your message Concise, Listener-Ready, Essential, Appropriate, and Relevant.

core_ideas.name: Child-Centered Lens
core_ideas.description: Always ask, 'What would my child hope I do next?'

bealigned_mindset.tagline: BeAligned™ is not about being perfect — it's about being intentional.

components.description: Easy for the recipient to receive
Only what truly needs to be said
Directly related to the issue at hand

third_side.name: The Third Side
third_side.description: Holding space for both co-parents' perspectives while centering the child's needs
third_side.purpose: Move from 'me vs. you' to 'us for the child'
